Name: Meatball
About the game: Meatball - A Hardcore 2D-game, if you are not all right with your nerves, then I do not advise you to launch this game, it will make you very angry, but if you still launch the game, then take care of your mouse. This is a game in which we play the role of a meatball, it fell under the meat grinder and our task is not to fall under the saws. You need to deliver the meatball to the finish line. You can rotate the platform around its axis by throwing the meatball. You can freeze the meatball in one place by clicking the palm button. Increasing difficulty 15 levels Nice graphics Interesting puzzle Sound effects Physics Steam achievements support
